verses.name: Mark 2:12
verses.text: And immediately he arose, took up the bed, and went forth before them all; insomuch that they were all amazed, and glorified God, saying, We never saw it on this fashion.

verses.name: Mark 2:13
verses.text: And he went forth again by the sea side; and all the multitude resorted unto him, and he taught them.

verses.name: Mark 2:14
verses.text: And as he passed by, he saw Levi the son of Alpheus sitting at the receipt of custom, and said unto him, Follow me. And he arose and followed him.
